title: GET_TRAIN_SPEED
content:
0x428668B7// GetTrainSpeed
float GET_TRAIN_SPEED(Vehicle train);Parameters:train: The train handleReturns: The current speed of the trainGets the speed the train is currently going.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_TRAIN_SPEED
GetTrainSpeed(vehicle)
